definition: to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
bored/fed up with sth/sick of sth
not to mind taking all the trouble (idiom)/to take great pains/to be very patient
to feel agitated/to be troubled/to be annoyed/an upset or distraction
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety

sentences.english: My brother has been plaguing me all weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥整個週末都在煩我。

sentences.english: You know the four tones and the stuff. It really freaks me out.
sentences.chinese: 你知道四聲那些東西，真夠煩的。

sentences.english: Don't upset yourself by thinking about what might have been.
sentences.chinese: 不要考慮那些可能發生的事來煩你自己。

sentences.english: Hey, Luz, why don't you leave her alone?
Will you please stop razzing me?
sentences.chinese: 你可不可以不要來煩我？

sentences.english: With a continuous supply of bubbles, you might get tired of all that popping.
sentences.chinese: 因爲氣泡源源不絕，你可能還會聽噗吱聲聽到煩呢。

sentences.english: Don't worry her; she is busy.
They are more relaxed and don't get bothered easily.
sentences.chinese: 他們比較輕鬆自在而且不容易覺得煩。

sentences.english: I'll conk you if you annoy me again.
sentences.chinese: 假如你再煩我，我就要打你的頭。

sentences.english: I asked some people what annoyed them.
sentences.chinese: 我問了一些人什麼令他們煩。

sentences.english: Once you start to dislike someone. Everything they do begins to annoy you.
sentences.chinese: 一旦開始討厭某個人，他的任何事情都會招你煩。

sentences.english: But that gentleman said "just to keep the womanizers from bothering you".
sentences.chinese: 可是那位紳士說這是“爲了防止登徒子們來煩你”。

sentences.english: Don't bother me. I'm already fed up.
sentences.chinese: 別來煩我，我已經一肚子的氣了。

sentences.english: Don't bother John when he is in a bad mood.
sentences.chinese: 約翰心情壞的時候不要煩他。

sentences.english: You see, she was buggin' me the whole time.
sentences.chinese: 好，我正想告訴你你知道，她整個時間都在煩我。

sentences.english: KING: Does it bother you, the security tie-ups?
sentences.chinese: 那些負責安全的人員讓你煩嗎？

definition: inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
to intertwine/to band together (with)/to link up (with)/twisted/tangled/confused/to be at a loss
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
